title: Hydrological Model - SimpleCanopy
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the simple canopy entity, which describes the method used to represent the plant canopy of the basin. It is associated with the Subasin entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be SimpleCanopy

initialStorage.description: A number representing the initial conditions of the canopy. Units: %

maxStorage.description: A number representing the maximum amount of water that can be held on leaves before the throughfall to the surface begins. Units: MM or IN (depending on the metric system) (required)

cropCoeff.description: A number specifying the ratio applied to potential evapotranspiration when computing the amount of water to extract from the soil

evapotranspiration.description: A text specifying when evapotranspiration will be included in the calculations.

uptakeMethod.description: A text specifying the uptake method used to extract water from the soil.
